languages.text: "Преподобная Арабелла Болинт, Ваша Светлость, из каликсийских Малых Болинтов. Приглашение на ваш корабль — честь для меня. Можете доверить мне свой экипаж — я всю жизнь занимаюсь миссионерством и наставлением. С малых лет меня влекло служение вере, и мне повезло учиться у самых доктринально строгих наставников Простора".

"Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Преподобная Арабелла Болинт, Ваша Светлость, из каликсийских Малых Болинтов. Приглашение на ваш корабль — честь для меня. Можете доверить мне свой экипаж — я всю жизнь занимаюсь миссионерством и наставлением. С малых лет меня влекло служение вере, и мне повезло учиться у самых доктринально строгих наставников Простора".

languages.text: "Konfessorin Arabella Bolint, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, von den calixischen niederen Bolints. Es ist eine Ehre, an Bord Eures Schiffs empfangen zu werden. Ihr könnt mir Eure Crew anvertrauen, denn ich bin schon mein Leben lang Missionarin und Praeceptorin. Ich wurde schon in jungen Jahren vom Glauben angezogen und hatte das Glück, bei einigen Mentoren zu studieren, die zu den strengsten Verfechtern der Doktrin in der Ausdehnung gehören."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Arabella Bolint, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, von den calixischen niederen Bolints. Es ist eine Ehre, an Bord Eures Schiffs empfangen zu werden. Ihr könnt mir Eure Crew anvertrauen, denn ich bin schon mein Leben lang Missionarin und Praeceptorin. Ich wurde schon in jungen Jahren vom Glauben angezogen und hatte das Glück, bei einigen Mentoren zu studieren, die zu den strengsten Verfechtern der Doktrin in der Ausdehnung gehören."

languages.text: «Confesora Arabella Bolint, mi{mf|lord|lady}, de los Bolint calixianos. Es un honor ser bienvenida a bordo de su nave. Puede confiarme a su tripulación, pues llevo toda la vida de misionera y preceptora. Me vi llamada al ministerio de la fe a muy temprana edad, y he tenido la suerte de haber estudiado con algunos de los mentores más rigurosamente doctrinarios de toda la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Reverenda Arabella Bolint, mi{mf|lord|lady}, de los Bolint calixianos. Es un honor ser bienvenida a bordo de su nave. Puede confiarme a su tripulación, pues llevo toda la vida de misionera y preceptora. Me vi llamada al ministerio de la fe a muy temprana edad, y he tenido la suerte de haber estudiado con algunos de los mentores más rigurosamente doctrinarios de toda la Extensión».

languages.text: 「カリシャン・レッサー・ボリントの聴罪師アラベラ・ボリントです、陛下。あなたの船に迎えられて光栄です。私は生涯宣教師であり指導者、あなたのクルーのことは私にお任せください。幼い頃から信仰に奉仕することに惹かれ、幸運にもエクスパンスで最も宗教の教えが厳格な指導者の下で勉強しました」
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「カリシャン・レッサー・ボリントのアラベラ・ボリント司祭です、陛下。あなたの船に迎えられて光栄です。私は生涯宣教師であり指導者、あなたのクルーのことは私に任せてください。幼い頃から信仰に奉仕することに惹かれ、幸運にもエクスパンスで最も宗教の教えが厳格なメンターの下で勉強しました」

languages.text: “我是告解神父阿拉贝拉·博林特，来自卡利西斯星区的小博林特，大人。我很荣幸能登上您的舰船，您可以放心地将您的船员托付给我，因为我一直以来都担任传教士与引导者的角色。我从小就被神皇的信仰吸引，还有幸在整个科罗努斯扩区最严格的导师指导下进行学习。”
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “我是阿拉贝拉·博林特牧师，来自卡利西斯星区的小博林特，大人。我很荣幸能登上您的舰船，您可以放心地将您的船员托付给我，因为我一直以来都担任布道士与引导者的角色。我从小就被神皇的信仰吸引，还有幸在整个科罗努斯扩区最严格的导师指导下进行学习。”

languages.text: « Confesseure Arabella Bolint, de la lignée mineure de Calixis, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un honneur que d'être reçue à bord de votre vaisseau. Vous pouvez me confier votre équipage sans crainte, car j'ai consacré ma vie entière à ma vocation de missionnaire et de préceptrice. J'ai ressenti l'appel de la foi dès mon plus jeune âge, et j'ai eu le privilège de faire mon séminaire sous la supervision des docteurs en religion les plus rigoristes de toutes les Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Révérende Arabella Bolint, de la lignée mineure de Calixis, Votre Seigneurie. C'est un honneur que d'être reçue à bord de votre vaisseau. Vous pouvez me confier votre équipage sans crainte, car j'ai consacré ma vie entière à ma vocation de missionnaire et de préceptrice. J'ai ressenti l'appel de la foi dès mon plus jeune âge, et j'ai eu le privilège de faire mon séminaire sous la supervision des docteurs en religion les plus rigoristes de toutes les Étendues. »

languages.text: "Ben Calixisli Aşağı Bolintlerden Günah Çıkarıcı Arabella Bolint {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Geminize kabul edilmek benim için bir onur. Mürettebatınızı bana emanet edebilirsiniz. Ömrüm misyonerlik ve eğitmenlik yapmakla geçti. Genç yaşımdan beri inanca hizmet etmek beni kendine çekmiştir ve Enginlik'teki en özenli doktrin eğitmenlerinin bazılarının öğrenciliğini yapma şansına eriştim."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Arabella Bolint, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, of the Calixian Lesser Bolints. It is an honour to be welcomed aboard your vessel. You may entrust me with your crew, for I am a lifelong missionary and preceptor. I was drawn to serving the faith from a young age, and I have been fortunate enough to have studied under some of the most doctrinally rigorous mentors in the Expanse."
